title: K-pop’s online activism for Black Lives Matter is complicated
description:
K-Pop fans have come to the aid of Black Lives Matter protestors online. If you know your history, that may come as a surprise.

Links:
A beginner’s guide to K-pop

How K-pop fans are weaponizing the internet for Black Lives Matter

Guests:
Aja Romano, Vox.com culture writer (@ajaromano)
Miranda Larsen, Kpop scholar and fan (https://twitter.com/AcaOtaku)

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
